title: What is the Gen C RDP assessment in Cognizant Technology Solutions for PAT? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Role Development Plan is important for employees to promote from one designation to another.They will allocate certain certifications to us that we need to complete in the given time span. And there will be three attempts to clear those RDP certifications and if not cleared we will face delay in promotions and other benefits. By the way still I didn’t take this RDP if any one attended earlier please share about the ways to clear. Thanks.

RDP includes 3 certificates assessments Behavioural assessment on which you will be trained at academy during training periodDomain specific assessment which purely includes domain related stuff( you will be trained on this too)Some basic basic languages like SQL, JAVA. Even you will be given training on this languages too.You need to clear all the assessments in the given time period i.e., before completion of 1 year from you DOJ. Once you are done with RDP you will be promoted to PA.
